title: Ep. 38 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: On this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer discuss Bert's recent drive-in movie theater tour, wiping barehanded, and Bert's foot race with his tour bus driver, Ron. Bert also reveals that he has started eating ice cream. A lot of ice cream. Tom and Bert then look at a Amazon review for Kool-Aid written by a fan, and Tom reveals new Kool-Aid inspired merch!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
